channel.title: I need a client
channel.description: Ok, I need the client like let's say you right-click on a tree. It will say its object number and its Position X & Y. Because those client's are really easy to use.. If you do have one of them or have a link from where I can download.. THANKS! :D

item.title: I need a client
item.dc:creator: @L0ST_PK3R L0ST PK3R
item.description:
@L0ST_PK3R wrote:

This is’nt Client help really, Just go to Server DL’s (DownLoads) And look for a good client what you’ll like.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a client
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

ANY position is its south west most peice of the model. As for the ID, there is a tutorial for that in the client-hacking section. I used that and within 2 minutes i was able to stop 5-10 reboots for like stairs and doors, now its just 1 reboot.

Read full topic
